channel.title: The Project on Network Communities of the Social Sciences
channel.description: Recent content in The Project on Network Communities of the Social Sciences

item.title: Datasets
item.description: Data # Here we have the datasets which we have used for the project. The Wikipedia Lists # Here we link to the five social science lists, which our project is build upon. Sociologists Psychologists Political Scientists Economists Anthropologists Here we have the different datasets which we used for the project.

item.title: Preprocess
item.description: Proprocessing the data # To construct this “community” of social scientists, we found inspiration by examining the Faculty of Social Science at Copenhagen University. The Social Science faculty have five overall departments: Sociology, Psychology, Economy, Anthropology, and Political Science. For each of these five categories we have a list of scientists on wikipedia. We used these five lists of scientists to find and all the scientists in our final dataset.
